website_summaries.verdict: A better premium engine starter fluid at a budget price. A good way to tackle difficult, rarely-maintained engines on a budget.
pros: Uses a concentrated starter formula that helps remove rust and debris buildup in hard-to-reach engine spots
Can be used in either gasoline or diesel engines in a variety of weather, including temperatures down to -65°F
cons: Doesn't come in a smaller can for quick emergencies

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: I winterized my lawnmower by draining out gas and adding just a smidge of antifreeze to the tank to keep the lines intact. Come spring, I pulled the mower out of a storage, flushed the tank, fuel lines and carburetor and tried to give it a go. DOA. So, YouTube recommended to get this to fix the problem. Voila, 2 seconds and one spray, problem solved, no issues since than. Saved me a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy B.

customer_reviews.title: It's flammable
customer_reviews.text: Not really much I can ask for. It is a fluid that sprays and burns, and that's exactly what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Pack of 6
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is a pack of 6 cans, great deal
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Used this on an old V8 that hadn't run in 20 years. Got the engine turning over just enough to catch and start running. No complaints, but not really better than what I had been using, so 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Alan Koeneke

customer_reviews.title: Always handy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Prestone starting fluid for a long time, both at home and on my ranch.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy 1

customer_reviews.title: product sale is for a 6 pack
customer_reviews.text: This product is priced for a 6 pack and i only received 1 can. Really expensive! I just received a second shipment of the same order and it came as 1 can also. At this rate it will take 2 months to get all 6.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works good as expected could not start my snowblower after days of trying use this product on it started right away After having it sit in the garage all summer .
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of starting fluid. This was a quick easy way to shop.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Prestone Premiun Starting Fluid to start my Honda FG110 Tiller
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I was having difficulty starting my Honda FG110 tiller until I started spraying some Prestone starter fluid in the carburetor chamber. What a difference! I don't have anymore start problems. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: William O. Caldwell Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great to get my old snowblower running
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to get my old snowblower running. Also fires up our 4 wheeler and snow mobile after sitting idle for a while. Has saved my behind many times.
customer_reviews.author: D Treee

customer_reviews.title: This stuff worked for me. We had a few ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked for me. We had a few of days of below 10F and my snow blower would not start, one little burst of this and it started on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: eggmoe

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was awesome! I usually have to drain the old gas and refill it, but with this it started up really easily! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Condon

customer_reviews.title: Good starter fluid
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't start my mower after a long winter. Disconnected the spark plug, sprayed this on the end that sparks, reconnected. Started right up. Works like starter fluid... who'd of thought?
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: A Great Help
customer_reviews.text: This starting fluid enabled me to start a generator which had not run for over 5 years. I find it a good thing to keep handy in the garage for starting balky engines.
customer_reviews.author: Lewin

customer_reviews.title: The smell..
customer_reviews.text: Started the car, but the smell of ether reminded me of 10th grade biology lab...
customer_reviews.author: Hozer

customer_reviews.title: Quality starting fluid, works like the NAPAs
customer_reviews.text: Works like the NAPA stuff we had been using, this is cheaper and works the same, thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Travis D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for yard equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Use it for hard-starting yard equipment. Works well and helps for that first startup of the year.
customer_reviews.author: whatevrworks

customer_reviews.title: Works great, shipping is slow.
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. It took quite a long time to arrive, but it got my riding lawn mower going again in no time.
customer_reviews.author: audiomagnate

customer_reviews.title: Works great on starting stubborn motors
customer_reviews.text: Fast ship, have used this stuff for years. Works great on starting stubborn motors.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Hoelzer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff !
customer_reviews.text: One shot and the engine starts ! If your engine needs a boost, this is the stuff to get.
customer_reviews.author: bbass

customer_reviews.title: Easy starting
customer_reviews.text: Don't use my generator and other machinery often and it makes easy pull starting for us old folks.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality ether! Wake up that sleepy seasonal engine. A must for the shelf!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL ANDRY

customer_reviews.title: Preston
customer_reviews.text: Prestone name been around long time i always felt confident any time i bought any of their products.. this starter fluid works great
customer_reviews.author: Theron L

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This starter fluid worked very well to get my ATV started in the winter
customer_reviews.author: Rob K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to have at hand to get garden tools running after winter.
customer_reviews.author: Scott in Austin, TX

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works.My vintage car sat for about 2 months without driving.So when I went to finally start it,it wouldn't.One shot of this starting fluid and I was back in business!
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: I have a Husqvarna riding mower that just doesn't like to start when it's below 70 degrees
customer_reviews.text: Almost miraculous! I have a Husqvarna riding mower that just doesn't like to start when it's below 70 degrees. Last year at the end of season I couldn't get it started no matter what. Cranked it until the battery was dead. Had some hard starts this year, but it always did get going. Then, I thought about trying Starting Fluid and purchased the Prestone AS237. The stuff works great! Today, after just about a minute of trying to start the mower, I grabbed the Prestone and gave about a half-second spray into the intake. Once I did that, the engine started immediately. Great stuff. I willalways have this on hand now.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Waterbury

customer_reviews.title: Started a very dead car
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't start my carbureted car that had been stored for 2 years. Flooded with stale gas, dying battery and 35 degrees were a bad combination. So I made a quick run to the store to pick this up. I just removed the air filter and sprayed this in the carburetor intake. On the next crank it started up after about 5 seconds. A little rough at first but smoothed out and I was able to drive to get new fuel. This was only a couple bucks! Well worth it though I wish it was a much smaller can... Because I've got like 200 more sprays of this stuff to use up or take to a hazardous waste dump.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hornig

customer_reviews.title: Revived a 15 yr old leaf blower after laying dormant for 2+ years
customer_reviews.text: Took a few long blasts into the air intake but got our 15 year old leaf blower started after 2 years of sitting in the garage - great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Boze

customer_reviews.title: If you can't prime a mower, use this spray.
customer_reviews.text: I did a total tune up of my mower (it would start, but would constantly die). New carborator, new spark plug, new priming bulb, etc. My mower now runs great!! But for some reason it just wont prime. Before I even sink more money into this mower, I wanted to try this starting fluid. Sprayed it into the air vent for 1 second. Pulled and it started on the first try (finally)! I have a few more ideas to try to fix my mower permanently. In the meantime Ill just use this spray.
customer_reviews.author: Item Man

customer_reviews.title: Keep this handy
customer_reviews.text: Starter fluid comes in very handy getting lawn mowers and snowblowers started.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flammable
customer_reviews.text: Yup. Highly flammable. Helps start lawnmowers and chainsaws. Also shoots flame like a boss when used in conjunction with a zippo. I'm sure that's dangerous, but sure does get rid of those pesky mosquitoes right quick.
customer_reviews.author: Dell

customer_reviews.title: Flamethrower!!!
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great flamethrower... just hold a lighter in front of the nozzle and spray!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D.

product_meta.title: Prestone AS237 Premium Starting Fluid - 10 oz.
product_meta.description: Style:Pack of 1Prestone Premium Starting Fluid is a high ethyl ether formula that helps start stubborn engines fast. Combustion ready even at -65 degrees Fahrenheit, Prestone's Premium Starting Fluid helps prevent excessive wear on batteries and starters. For use in cars, trucks, lawnmowers, snowmobiles, marine, and construction equipment, this starting fluid is safe and effective in gasoline and diesel engines. Prestone Premium Starting Fluid can help start engines with either too little fuel or too much, as in the case of a flooded engine. This high ether formula is designed to ensure ignition because of its broad range of flammability. It also complies with the federal low-sulfur content requirements for use in diesel motor vehicles and non-road engines.
feature_bullets: Designed to start stubborn engines fast in cold weather
Start engines with either too little fuel or too much, as in the case of a flooded engine
Safe and effective in gasoline and diesel engines, including cars, trucks, lawnmowers, snowmobiles, marine, and construction equipment
Designed to ensure ignition because of its broad range of flammability
